body_html:
@aselle

I am looking for a way to deploy the CNN+stack_bidirectional_dynamic_rnn+CTC on mobile devices, and it seems that LSTM layers are not supported by tf-lite, but I happened to find the following code, so I want to know is it possible to support LSTM layers with tf-lite, thank you ?
